title: BRIEF-Gamestop Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $2.02
text:
March 28, 2018 / 8:22 PM / in 13 minutes BRIEF-Gamestop Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $2.02 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
March 28 (Reuters) - Gamestop Corp: 
* GAMESTOP REPORTS SALES AND EARNINGS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 AND PROVIDES 2018 OUTLOOK * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $1.04 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.97 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* QTRLY TOTAL GLOBAL SALES INCREASED 15.0% TO $3.50 BILLION 
* QTRLY CONSOLIDATED COMPARABLE STORE SALES GROWTH OF 12.2% * SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.00 TO $3.35 
* SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES $110.0 MILLION TO $120.0 MILLION 
* POSITIVE IMPACT OF TAX REFORM WAS $0.03 PER DILUTED SHARE IN QUARTER * Q4 REVENUE VIEW $3.27 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.26, REVENUE VIEW $8.97 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
